statements: SELECT * FROM driver_profiles
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM driver_profiles WHERE age > 30
SELECT driver_id, preferred_music_genre FROM driver_profiles ORDER BY preferred_music_genre ASC
SELECT first_name, age FROM driver_profiles WHERE preferred_temperature < 20.0
SELECT * FROM driver_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35
SELECT * FROM driver_profiles WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, preferred_music_genre FROM driver_profiles WHERE preferred_temperature > 20;
SELECT driver_id, first_name, age FROM driver_profiles WHERE preferred_music_genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM driver_profiles WHERE preferred_temperature BETWEEN 18 AND 25 AND age < 30;
SELECT driver_id, last_name, preferred_temperature FROM driver_profiles WHERE first_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY preferred_temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_id, first_name, phone_number FROM drivers ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE music_preference = 'Pop' OR temperature_preference > 25;
SELECT driver_id, music_preference FROM preferences WHERE temperature_preference <= 20;
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM drivers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT driver_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM drivers JOIN preferences ON drivers.driver_id = preferences.driver_id;
SELECT first_name, music_preference, temperature_preference FROM drivers JOIN preferences ON drivers.driver_id = preferences.driver_id WHERE temperature_preference > 20;
SELECT * FROM drivers
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM drivers
SELECT song_name, artist_name, genre FROM music_library
SELECT * FROM car_preferences
SELECT audio_preference, temperature_preference FROM car_preferences
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE first_name = 'John' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM car_preferences INNER JOIN drivers ON car_preferences.driver_id = drivers.driver_id WHERE audio_preference = 'Bluetooth' AND temperature_preference > 25;
SELECT song_name, artist_name FROM music_library WHERE genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY artist_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM car_preferences WHERE temperature_preference < 20 ORDER BY preference_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Drivers;
SELECT driver_name, driver_email FROM Drivers WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT car_model, car_color, car_year FROM Cars WHERE car_year > 2015;
SELECT pref_name, pref_value FROM Preferences WHERE driver_id = 2;
SELECT trip_date, start_location, end_location FROM Trips ORDER BY trip_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Drivers WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT driver_name, driver_email FROM Drivers WHERE driver_id > 3;
SELECT car_model, car_color, car_year FROM Cars WHERE car_year < 2010;
SELECT pref_name, pref_value FROM Preferences WHERE driver_id = 2;
SELECT trip_date, start_location, end_location FROM Trips WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM driver_profile;
SELECT driver_name, driver_age FROM driver_profile WHERE driver_age > 30;
SELECT driver_id, driver_name, driver_address FROM driver_profile ORDER BY driver_name ASC;
SELECT playlist_name, songs_count FROM music_playlist WHERE songs_count <= 20 ORDER BY playlist_name DESC;
SELECT driver_id, latitude, longitude FROM driver_location WHERE longitude BETWEEN -90.0 AND 90.0;
SELECT driver_name, driver_age FROM driver_profile WHERE driver_id = 100;
SELECT notification_message, notification_date FROM notification_history ORDER BY notification_date DESC;
SELECT playlist_name, songs_count FROM music_playlist WHERE songs_count > 10 ORDER BY songs_count DESC;
SELECT driver_name, car_type, music_preference FROM driver_profile JOIN car_preference ON driver_profile.driver_id = car_preference.driver_id;
SELECT driver_name, driver_address, latitude, longitude FROM driver_profile JOIN driver_location ON driver_profile.driver_id = driver_location.driver_id WHERE driver_age > 30;
